mapper.select: select * from PersonD where date=(select date from PersonD where id=(select MAX(id) as id from PersonD)) order by region,id DESC

select region, sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total,date from PersonD where date=(select date from PersonD where id=(select MAX(id) as id from PersonD)) group by date,region

select sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total,date from PersonD where date=(select date from PersonD where id=(select MAX(id) as id from PersonD)) group by date
select * from PersonD where date1>=#{date1} and date2>=#{date2}

select region, sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total,date from PersonD where date=#{date} group by date,region order by date DESC

select sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total,date from PersonD where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) group by date
mapper.insert: insert into PersonD( region, personalLeave, sickLeave, annualLeave, nursingLeave, bereavementLeave) values(#{region},#{personalLeave},#{sickLeave},#{annualLeave},#{nursingLeave},#{bereavementLeave})
